MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L36 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Waterside Park and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:45PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of an underground cable fault. Our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 02:00AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:19PM on 7th February 2021.
